others.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a strong background in backend development, web development, and database management. Skilled in Java, Python, JavaScript, and various system platforms. Seeking a challenging role in the tech industry to leverage my expertise in developing scalable and efficient solutions.

professional_experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Worked within open-source project: Open Network Operating System (ONOS).
Developed system features by creating RESTful API modules, improving feature delivery by 25%.
Led integration development and testing process in collaboration with the open-source community for ONOS dynamic configuration brigade (Project link).
Researched AI solutions for SDN controller project to achieve network self-monitoring and reliability-control (Project link).
Technology: Java, Python, Software Defined Network

professional_experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and contributed to ONOS automation integration module's codebase (Python, shell script), providing a stable Network Function Virtualization (NFV) environment.
Designed and developed a full-stack automated testbed, reducing testing time by 30%.
Technology: Java, Python, Shell Script, Ansible, OpenStack, Linux

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Science
